articles.description:

articles.author: Stan Schroeder
articles.title: Google Workspace is now free for everyone
articles.description:
Google Workspace — the company's suite of business tools previously known as Google Suite — is now free, and available to everyone.
This may be confusing to some Google users, who have been using apps such as Gmail, Meet, and Docs for a while without paying a…

articles.title: Beats' new Studio Buds are a lot more Android-friendly
articles.description:

articles.title: Buffalo Sabres Win N.H.L. Draft Lottery
articles.description: The Sabres missed the playoffs for the 10th consecutive season and had the best odds for the No. 1 pick. Owen Power, from the University of Michigan, is most widely projected to be taken first.
